doc.title: 10 Finnish Architects: An Outsider's View
doc.plot: Before documentary film maker Maggy Fellman moved to Finland from Los Angeles, she knew the country was known for it's architecture. Now together with the Museum of Finnish Architecture she has chosen ten Finnish architects to show why the country deserves it's fine reputation. Lars Sonc - Eira hospital, Kaarina Löfström - Innopoli 1 and Innopoli 2, Alvar Aalto - Villa Mairea, Wivi Lönn - Tampere fire station, Yrjö Lindegren - Olympic Stadium, Kimmo Lintula & Hannu Tikka - Sibelius Hall, Eliel Saarinen - Hvitträsk, Jyrki Tasa - Into House, Carl Ludvig Engel - University Library, Theodor Höijer - Ateneum.

Before documentary film maker Maggy Fellman moved to Finland from Los Angeles, she knew the country was known for it's architecture. Now together with the Museum of Finnish Architecture she has chosen ten Finnish architects to show why the country deserves it's fine reputation. Lars Sonc - Eira hospital, Kaarina Löfström - Innopoli 1 and Innopoli 2, Alvar Aalto - Villa Mairea, Wivi Lönn - Tampere fire station, Yrjö Lindegren - Olympic Stadium, Kimmo Lintula & Hannu Tikka - Sibelius Hall, Eliel Saarinen - Hvitträsk, Jyrki Tasa - Into House, Carl Ludvig Engel - University Library, Theodor Höijer - Ateneum.
